DocAttribute.Name: BoxHeight
DocAttribute.Documentation: It is the height scaling factor in the definition of a character glyph.

DocAttribute.Name: BoxWidth
DocAttribute.Documentation: It is the width scaling factor in the definition of a character glyph.

DocAttribute.Name: BoxSlantAngle
DocAttribute.Documentation: It indicated that the box of a character glyph shall be represented as a parallelogram, with the angle being between the character up line and an axis perpendicular to the character base line.

DocAttribute.Name: BoxRotateAngle
DocAttribute.Documentation: It indicated that the box of a character glyph shall be presented at an angle to the base line of a text string within which the glyph occurs, the angle being that between the base line of the glyph and an axis perpendicular to the baseline of the text string.

DocAttribute.Name: CharacterSpacing
DocAttribute.Documentation: The distance between the character boxes of adjacent characters.
